item.title: Guide for Using an R Package for Reproducible Research
item.description: Motivation What I used to do Why use an R package? How-to Guide Requirements Tutorial Setup Workflow Bonus steps Other Readings Motivation Iâ€™ve been wondering about the best way to organize (reproducible) research projects in R for a while now. I figured this might be a good spot to write up some thoughts. What I used to do Initially my projects would consist of just a few R files that separate out functions from a main script that calls the functions.
